Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.GUI

Class Metrics

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.GUI.Metrics
public class Metrics extends Object
Class that holds all the information about the metrics of the graphic elements
